doc.field: Burlington Industries Inc is raising 75 mln dlrs through an offering of convertible subordinated debentures due 2012 with a 6-1/4 pct coupon and par pricing, said lead manager Kidder, Peabody and Co Inc. The debentures are convertible into the company's common stock at 63.50 dlrs per share, representing a premium of 18.1 pct over the stock price when terms on the debt were set. Non-callable for three years, the issue is rated Ba-2 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and BBB by Standard and Poor's Corp. Merrill Lynch Capital Markets and Salomon Brothers Inc co-managed the deal. Reuter
